wordGroup: in deference to 鉴于；听从

sentences.en: The patronage, entwined with the ordinary deference, was not plain to them.
sentences.cn: 这种恩宠与平常的顺从交织在一起，对他们来说并不寻常。

sentences.en: The flags were lowered out of deference to the bereaved family.
sentences.cn: 降旗是出于对死者家属的尊重。

sentences.en: The women wore veils in deference to the customs of the country.
sentences.cn: 这些妇女戴着面纱是遵从这个国家的习俗。
